color.description: Key of theme.colors of any valid CSS value, by default theme.white in dark color scheme and theme.black in light
color.description_zh: 任何有效 CSS 值的 theme.colors 的键，默认情况下，theme.white 为深色配色方案，theme.black 为浅色

lineSize.description: Controls height of lines, by default calculated based on size prop
lineSize.description_zh: 控制线条的高度，默认根据 size 属性计算

opened.description: State of the burger, when true burger is transformed into X, false by default
opened.description_zh: 汉堡的状态，当 true 汉堡转换为 X 时，默认为 false

size.description: Controls burger width and height, numbers are converted to rem, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制汉堡的宽度和高度，数字默认转换为 rem、'md'

transitionDuration.description: transition-duration property value in ms, 300 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: transition-duration 属性值（以毫秒为单位），默认为 300
